title: Analyze Image
description: Describe images, extract text via OCR, and compare multiple images using AI vision models
author: Jarvis Inc

commands.name: describe
commands.description: Generate a detailed description of an image

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL of the image to analyze

returns.description: Image description with main subject, scene details, colors, text found, objects detected, and suggested tags

commands.name: extract_text
commands.description: Extract all text content from an image using OCR

parameters.name: image_url
parameters.description: URL of the image containing text

returns.description: Extracted text with full content, structured blocks (headers, paragraphs, lists), and confidence scores

commands.name: compare
commands.description: Compare two or more images and identify similarities and differences

parameters.name: image_urls
parameters.description: Array of image URLs to compare (2-4 images)

returns.description: Comparison report with similarities, differences, per-criteria analysis, and ranking if applicable
